actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.
Executive Comment Requested from ACIR, GSA, HHS, OMB.
Referred to Subcommittee on Intergovernmental Relations and Human Resources.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Intergovernmental Relations and Human Resources

official_title: A bill establishing a national toll-free telephone information line for senior citizens, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Health and Human Services, through the Commissioner of the Administration on Aging, to make available through a national toll-free telephone line information concerning federally administered programs, services, and benefits for which senior citizens may be eligible. Requires the Secretary to cooperate with other information and referral services to ensure that information concerning non-federally administered benefits is also made available.

titles.title: A bill establishing a national toll-free telephone information line for senior citizens, and for other purposes.
